import React, { Component } from "react"; import Link from "next/link"; import { ChevronsLeft, Home, Activity, User, Search, BookOpen, Calendar, Mail, } from "react-feather"; // this would be the user's name, it is static here for showcase purposes const Username = () => { return "Alexandra"; }; export default class SideBarNav extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { width: 0, height: 0, navOpen: true, }; } componentDidMount() { this.updateWindowDimensions(); window.addEventListener('resize', this.updateWindowDimensions); } componentWillUnmount() { window.removeEventListener('resize', this.updateWindowDimensions); } updateWindowDimensions = () => { this.setState({ width: window.innerWidth, height: window.innerHeight }); } handleNavButtonClick = () => { this.setState({navOpen: !this.state.navOpen}) }; render() { let navClassName = this.state.navOpen ? "sidebarcontainer" : "smsidebarcontainer"; let navIconClassName = this.state.navOpen ? "col-5 text-right" : "col text-center"; let navTextClassName = this.state.navOpen ? "col pl-0" : "d-none"; let navIconButtonClassName = this.state.navOpen ? 'navIconButton' : 'navIconButtonClosed' return (
    Your Hosptial
    Activity
    Search
    Courses
    Calendar
    Messages
); } }
